question: Why did Uriah disobey King David by refusing to go to his house to sleep during the Ammonite war? Because
options: it was wrong to go home drunk
his wife would regard him a coward
it would be unpatriotic to break military vow
suspected that the king had lost interest in the battles
answer: it would be unpatriotic to break military vow

question: Which of the following is not the purpose God created the sun, moon and stars?
options: To separate the day from the night
For signs of seasons, days and years
To give light upon the earth
To dry up flood from the face of the earth
answer: To dry up flood from the face of the earth

ate of the tree of good and evil
answer: ate of the tree of good and evil

question: What was Abram’s obligation in his covenant with God?
options: Offer his son Isaac as a sacrifice

question: How did God prepare Joseph for his leadership role in Egypt? Through
options: the love which his father had for him
the trials and temptations of his earlier years
answer: the trials and temptations of his earlier years

answer: His children lust after women at worship

answer: The age of Samuel and the conduct of his sons

question: What was Jesus’ reply when Satan told Him to bow down and worship him?
options: You shall not tempt the Lord your God
Be gone Satan, for it is written, you shall worship the Lord your God and Him only shall you serve
Be gone Satan, you shall not tempt the Lord your God
Be gone Satan, you shall not tempt the Lord your God, and Him only shall you serve
answer: Be gone Satan, for it is written, you shall worship the Lord your God and Him only shall you serve
